Special: Balanced, Power Field

Note: If the wielder successfully parries another weapon with this one and succeeds by 2+ DoS, they automatically destory the other weapon if it is not immune to power fields. If Attack/Parry fails by 5+ DoF, resolve attack against wielder. Do not add Strength Bonus to attack damage with this weapon.
